text: <textsound=lama|0.4> <textjump=0.5|2|1>Hello, I come to see you, well so to speak since I don't see a thing anymore.
<textjump=0.5|2|1>What do you mean you can't see a thing?<textpause=0.5> What is going on?
<textjump=0.5|2|1>Shouldn't you be able to see better than the average person?
<textjump=0.2|2|10><textspeed=40>Well no, i don't see a thing anymore, you see I am myopic, recently I have not been able to find any glasses that fit my body shape!
There is some poeple who says to simply close my third eye but my species cannot.
<textjump=0.5|2|1>But why this, the triclope glasses have become widespread these last years?
<textjump=0.5|2|1>Standard glasses can't do the trick ?
<textjump=0.5|2|1>You see I'm an optician, glasses are my buisiness and triclope glasses were very present on the market yesterday<textspeed=1>...
<textjump=0.5|2|1>How could they disapear so easily from the market ?
<textjump=0.5|2|1>I feel like there have been a lot of changes in our city recently.

<textjump=0.2|2|5>Yes I've heard of stupid laws “No arms, no chocolates”<textpause=0.5>, “Blue people forbidden to go to the pool”<textspeed=1>...<textspeed=15> Our world goes<color=red><textrumble=0.1|-1|2><b> CRAZY</color></textrumble>!
You know how difficult it is to see with only TWO eyes aligned?
<textjump=0.5|2|1>Indeed it doesn't sound easy, let's start the<color=#6500c5></textjump><textjump=0.5|-1|5> hypnosis</color></textjump><textjump=0.5|2|1> shall we ?
<textjump=0.5|2|1>Stare at my watch<color=#6500c5></textjump><textjump=0.5|-1|5> carefully</color></textjump><textjump=0.5|2|1><textspeed=1>...
<textjump=0.5|2|1>Concentrate on my <color=#6500c5></textjump><textjump=0.5|-1|5>voice
<playsound=wrong_choice><textjump=0.5|2|1>I can't see anything<textspeed=1>...<textspeed=15> You remember?
<playsound=good_choice> <textjump=0.5|2|1>Ok, let's focus.
<textjump=0.5|2|1>Close your third eye and you will see.
<textjump=0.5|2|1>Use a monocle in addition to your glasses.
I can't close it I told you! In my species the young ones are insomniac up to 12.
<playsound=good_choice> <textjump=0.5|2|1>Yes its a good idea, but its still a shame toget at this kind of situation.
Its useful for me but how do I sell two object separately at my clients rather than one? They'll never accept it!
<textjump=0.5|2|1>Then let's try another way, another job.
Think about the job of your dreams, when you were a child you desired...
To be an ophtalmologist.
To be an astronaut.
I'm not and do not desire to be an ophtalmologist!
You don't even listen to me, I'm leaving!
I'd like to be one yes. Since my childhood I'm dreaming of watching the stars more closely.
At my top you will have a strong desire to become an astronaut and will do anything to become one! TOP!
